com.gmail.val59000mc.scoreboard

Class Placeholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.val59000mc.scoreboard.Placeholder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlocksToTeamLeader, ScenariosPlaceholder, TeamMembersPlaceholder, TimersPlaceholder

    public abstract class Placeholder
extends java.lang.Object
    Placeholders are used to get custom dynamic data on the scoreboard. You must register them using the ScoreboardManager.registerPlaceholder(Placeholder) method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Placeholder(java.lang.String... placeholders)
      Include the placeholders you want this placeholder object to deal with.

      • getReplacement

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getReplacement(UhcPlayer uhcPlayer,
                                                    org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                    ScoreboardType scoreboardType)
        Deprecated. Has been replaced by getReplacement(UhcPlayer, Player, ScoreboardType, String).
        Used to get replacements for placeholder.
        Parameters:
        uhcPlayer - The UhcPlayer the replacement is requested for.
        player - The Player the replacement is requested for.
        scoreboardType - The ScoreboardType at the time of getting the placeholder.
        Returns:
        Returns the replacement.

      • getReplacement

        public java.lang.String getReplacement(UhcPlayer uhcPlayer,
                                       org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                       ScoreboardType scoreboardType,
                                       java.lang.String placeholder)
        Used to get replacements for placeholder. This method must be overridden in your custom placeholder!
        Parameters:
        uhcPlayer - The UhcPlayer the replacement is requested for.
        player - The Player the replacement is requested for.
        scoreboardType - The ScoreboardType at the time of getting the placeholder.
        placeholder - The placeholder found in the replacement string.
        Returns:
        Returns the replacement.

      • parseString

        public java.lang.String parseString(java.lang.String string,
                                    UhcPlayer uhcPlayer,
                                    org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    ScoreboardType scoreboardType)
        Used to parse a string trough the placeholder.
        Parameters:
        string - The parsed string.
        uhcPlayer - The UhcPlayer the string is parsed for.
        player - The Player the string is parsed for.
        scoreboardType - The ScoreboardType the string is parsed for.
        Returns:
        Returns the string with parsed placeholders.
